name: Atlantis Luxury Tower Room
description: Luxury Tower Rooms occupy floors 3 through 20 of Atlantis's newest and most recently renovated tower. Available in king and two-queen configurations, they feature upscale furnishings, plush bedding, rich marble accents, and floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic Sierra Nevada or city views. In-room amenities include Bose Wave Radio, 55-inch flat-screen HDTV, premium Wi-Fi, and June Jacobs luxury bath products. Refrigerators are available in Luxury Tower rooms. The Concierge Lounge on the 25th floor is not included but may be purchased as an upgrade.
shortDescription: Renovated tower rooms on floors 3–20 with upscale furnishings, marble accents, and panoramic views.

faqs.question: Do Luxury Tower Rooms have refrigerators?
faqs.answer: Yes. Atlantis provides refrigerators in all Luxury Tower rooms. Concierge and Suite categories also include them.

faqs.question: What floor are Luxury Tower Rooms on?
faqs.answer: Floors 3 through 20 of Atlantis's third and newest tower, which has been fully renovated with a contemporary aesthetic.

testimonials.quote: The rooms are modern and well-appointed. Upper-floor rooms are quieter and have better city views — book as high as you can get.
testimonials.author: KAYAK reviewer

testimonials.quote: Very clean, nice rooms. Comfy beds. The Atlantis is consistently the best hotel experience in Reno — staff goes above and beyond.
